description: Try our easy to follow Super Greenie Bowl recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Super Greenie Bowl Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 100g small button mushrooms, sliced and quartered

recipeInstructions.text: Prepare noodles as per packet instructions. Drain and rinse well. Toss with tamari and sesame oil.
Place broccolini and peas into a bowl and cover with boiling water for 1 minute. Drain and refresh in cold water. Drain well.
Arrange noodles, mushrooms and blanched vegetables in a bowl. Roughly mash avocado with ricotta and lemon juice. Halve egg and add to bowl with avocado mash.
